name: Clown Evolution World
description:
EAT, DIE, FIGHT, EVOLVE!
From the makers of the popular Alien Evolution World, Lionbird Ltd, comes the new game in the series— Clown Evolution World!

Dive into this crazy universe where the only way to survive is to constantly evolve. Feed your clown with three special types of food, and it will have the opportunity to evolve into endless other forms, including the Joker, Gazorpazop Clown, the all powerful Plague Incorporation Clown, and have a chance to become IT, the title given to the most evolved clown!

- Enjoy tons of witty dialogue filled with hilarious references.
- Play mini games to earn food and resources!
- Follow the evolution guide to feed your clown, and discover more epic and new forms!
